articles.author: Joseph Ziegler
articles.description: Roseburg is expected to hit 83°F on Monday, making it the hottest day of 2025 so far. That’s nearly 20 degrees above normal for April. The previous high this year was 78°F. While not a record, it’s close - the hottest April 14th on record was 88°F, set back in 1947
articles.title: Roseburg Set for Hottest Day of 2025 So Far
